General.Name: Sicher Elevator Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Sicher Elevator Co., Ltd.. manufactures and sells elevators, escalators and parking system equipment. It provides passenger, observation, bed, car, hydraulic, home, and freight lifts; and parking systems and escalators, moving walks, and lift decoration products. Its products are used in residential, office, public and transportation, and shopping malls and hotel applications. It offers its products under the SRH, LHEC, SICHERHEIT, and SICHER brands. Sicher Elevator Co., Ltd. is based in Huzhou, China.
